name: Weird Cubes (LD38)
description:
Made in 48 hours during Ludum Dare 38.

Reach the goal in a small world of touch activated cubes.

  • Levitate objects to solve puzzles and reach places
  • 3d platforming
  • 6 levels with different small gimmicks

Keyboard and mouse controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to turn
  • Space to jump
  • Left mouse button to levitate objects

When levitating an object:

  • Scroll wheel to adjust distance
  • Hold right mouse button and use mouse to rotate objects

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/weird-cubes
